name: Water System
headline: Rutgers University Engineers Without Borders Chapter borehole well in Kolunje, Kenya
description: The community of Kolunje, Kenya was in need of a water system and reached out to Engineers Without Borders for assistance and the Rutgers University Chapter accepted the proposal. During my year with the team, I helped prepare technical drawings of the system layout and finalized documents required to get approval to travel to Kenya to begin construction.
